entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Pasio)
entries.description: Played in battles against normal trainers without a specified region like Swimmers, Street Thugs, etc.

entries.name: Battle! Boss (Pasio)
entries.description: Played in battles against boss trainers without a specified region.

entries.name: Battle! Alder
entries.description: Played in battles against Alder, the former champion of the Unova region.

entries.name: Battle! Cyrus
entries.description: Played in battles against Cyrus, the boss of Team Galactic. He aims to form a new world without spirit or emotions.

entries.name: Battle! Archie
entries.description: Played in battles against Archie, the boss of Team Aqua. He aims increase the water bodies of the planet with the help of Kyogre.

entries.name: Battle! Rival (Cheren/Bianca)
entries.description: Played in battles against Cheren and Bianca, rivals of the protagonists of Pokemon Black and Pokemon White, Hilbert and Hilda.

entries.name: Battle! Elite 4 (Alola)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Alola, namely Olivia, Nanu, Acerola, Kahili and Molayne.

entries.name: Battle! Acerola (Alola Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Acerola in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Hala (Alola Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Hala in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kahili (Alola Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Kahili in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Olivia (Alola Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Olivia in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Molayne (Alola Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Molayne in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Elite 4 (Kalos)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Kalos, namely Siebold, Wikstrom, Drasna and Malva.

entries.name: Battle! Elite 4 (Hoenn)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Hoenn, namely Sidney, Glacia, Phoebe and Drake.

entries.name: Battle! Elite 4 (Unova)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Unova, namely Marshal, Shauntal, Grimsley and Caitlin.

entries.name: Battle! Caitlin (Unova Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Caitlin in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Grimsley (Unova Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Grimsley in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Marshal (Unova Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Marshal in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Shauntal (Unova Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Shauntal in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Will (Johto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Will in the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Karen (Johto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Karen in the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Koga (Johto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Koga in the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Bruno (Johto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Bruno int the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Lorelei (Kanto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Lorelei in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Agatha (Kanto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Agatha in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Bruno (Kanto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Bruno in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Lance (Kanto Challenge)
entries.description: Played in battles against Lance in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Elite 4 (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Sinnoh, namely Flint, Aron, Bertha and idk who.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Team Break)
entries.description: Played in battles against normal trainers of Team Break.

entries.name: Battle! Boss (Team Break)
entries.description: Played in battles against boss trainers of Team Break.

entries.name: Battle! Diantha
entries.description: Played in battles against Diantha, the champion of the Kalos region.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Holiday)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the christmas holiday event.

entries.name: Battle! Champion Hau
entries.description: Played in battles against Hau in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Battle Chatelaine
entries.description: Played in battles against Battle Chatelaine Trainers.

entries.name: Battle! Steven
entries.description: Played in battles against Steven, the champion of the Hoenn Region.

entries.name: Battle! Leon
entries.description: Played in battles against Leon, the champion of the Galar Region.

entries.name: Battle! Lear's Retainer (Rachel/Sawyer)
entries.description: Played in battles against Rachel and Sawyer, faithful retainers of Lear.

entries.name: Battle! Lear
entries.description: Played in battles against Lear, the heir of an unknown kingdom, founder of the Pasio region, and the host of the Pokemon Masters League, PML for short.

entries.name: Battle! Frontier Brain (Hoenn)
entries.description: Played in battles against the frontier brains of the Hoenn Region Battle Frontier facility.

entries.name: Battle! Frontier Brain (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in battles against the frontier brains of the Sinnoh Region Battle Frontier facility.

entries.name: Battle! Lysandre
entries.description: Played in battles against Lysandre, the boss of Team Flare. He aims to wipe out a significant amount of lives from the planet with the help of Yveltal.

entries.name: Battle! Ghetsis
entries.description: Played in battles against Ghetsis, the boss of Team Galactic and Team Neo Galactic. He aims to liberate Pokemon for the well-being of both Pokemon and Humans. He is also the adopted father of N.

entries.name: Battle! Grunt (Team Galactic)
entries.description: Played in battles against the grunts of Team Galactic.

entries.name: Battle! Admin (Team Galactic)
entries.description: Played in battles against the admins of Team Galactic, namely Mars, Jupiter and Saturn.

entries.name: Battle! Gladion
entries.description: Played in battles against Gladion, the brother of Lillie and son of Lusamine.

entries.name: Battle! Gladion (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Gladion".

entries.name: Battle! Island Kahuna (Alola)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Island Kahunas of the Alola Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader (Kalos)
entries.description: Played in battles against the 8 Gym Leaders of the Kalos Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader (Galar)
entries.description: Played in battles against the 8 Gym Leaders of the Galar Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader (Hoenn)
entries.description: Played in battles against the 8 Gym Leaders of the Hoenn Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader (Unova)
entries.description: Played in battles against the 8 Gym Leaders of the Unova Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader/Elite 4 (Johto)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 and the 8 Gym Leaders of the Johto Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader/Elite 4 (Kanto)
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 and the 8 Gym Leaders of the Kanto Region.

entries.name: Battle! Gym Leader (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in battles against the 8 Gym Leaders of the Sinnoh Region.

entries.name: Battle! Blue
entries.description: Played in battles against Blue, the former champion of the Kanto Region and the rival of Red.

entries.name: Battle! Guzma
entries.description: Played in battles against Guzma, the boss of Team Skull.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Halloween)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the halloween season event.

entries.name: Battle! Looker
entries.description: Played in battles against Looker, a detective of International Police from the Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Hau
entries.description: Played in battles against Hau, a rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Sun and Pokemon Moon, Elio and Selene.

entries.name: Battle! Zinnia
entries.description: Played in battles against Zinnia, the heir of the Draconic tribe. She was bestowed upon a job with Rayquaza. Her battle theme uses violins, and I love it.

entries.name: Battle! Hop
entries.description: Played in battles against Hop, the younger brother of Leon & the rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Sword and Pokemon Shield, Victor and Gloria.

entries.name: Battle! Iris
entries.description: Played in battles against Iris, the champion of the Unova Region, the daughter of Drayden and a former Gym Leader of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Barry
entries.description: Played in battles against Barry, the rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Diamond, Pokemon Pearl and Pokemon Platinum, Lucas and Dawn.

entries.name: Battle! Kukui
entries.description: Played in battles against Professor Kukui, a professor from the Alola Region and the husband of Professor Burnet. He is totally not Masked Royal, ok??.

entries.name: Battle! Lake Guardian
entries.description: Played in battles against the lake guardian trio of the Sinnoh Region. It consists of Mesprit, Uzie and Azelf.

entries.name: Battle! Cresselia
entries.description: Played in battles against Cresselia, a legendary Pokemon of the Sinnoh Region.

entries.name: Battle! Entei
entries.description: Played in battles against Entei, a legendary Pokemon of the Johto Region and a member of the Legendary Beat Trio.

entries.name: Battle! Ho-oh
entries.description: Played in battles against Ho-oh, a legendary Pokemon of the Johto Region.

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Pokemon (Kanto)
entries.description: Played in battles against the legendary Pokemon of the Kanto Region.

entries.name: Battle! Island Guardian
entries.description: Played in battles against the 4 Island Guardians of the Alola Region, namely Tapu Koko, Tapu Fini, Tapu Bulu and Tapu Lele, also known as the "Tapus".

entries.name: Battle! Latias/Latios
entries.description: Played in battles against Latias and Latios, legendary Pokemon of the Hoenn Region.

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Pokemon
entries.description: Played as a general battle theme in battles against Legendary Pokemon.

entries.name: Battle! Regi
entries.description: Played in battles against the Regi Pokemon.

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Pokemon (Alola)
entries.description: Played in battles against Legendary Pokemon of the Alola Region.

entries.name: Battle! Super Ancient Pokemon
entries.description: Played in battles against Super Ancient Pokemon of the Hoenn Region, namely Groudon, Kyogre and Rayquaza, also called the Weather Trio.

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Pokemon (Unova)
entries.description: Played in battles against Legendary Pokemon of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Lillie
entries.description: Played in battles against Lillie, the sister of Gladion and the daughter of Lusamine.

entries.name: Battle! Lillie (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Lillie".

entries.name: Battle! Lisia
entries.description: Played in battles against Lisia, niece of Wallace, a contest idol and a performer.

entries.name: Battle! Lusamine
entries.description: Played in battles against Lusamine, boss of the Aether Paradise and the mother of young ambitious trainers, Gladion and Lillie.

entries.name: Battle! Lusamine (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Lusamine".

entries.name: Battle! Marnie
entries.description: Played in battles against Marnie, the sister of the 7th Gym Leader of Galar, Piers. Her brother formed Team Yell to cheer and support her in battles.

entries.name: Battle! Maxie
entries.description: Played in battles against Maxie, the leader of Team Magma.  He aims to increase the landmass of the Earth for greater heights of achievements and progress of Humankind .

entries.name: Battle! Maxie (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Maxie".

entries.name: Battle! Wallace
entries.description: Played in battles against Wallace, the 8th Gym Leader of the Hoenn Region, uncle of Lisia, and in some timelines, the champion of the Hoenn Region.

entries.name: Battle! Wally
entries.description: Played in battles against Wally, the rival of the protagonists of the 3rd Generation Pokemon Games as well as their remakes, Brendan and May.

entries.name: Battle! N
entries.description: Played in battles against N, the son of Ghetsis and king of Team Plasma. His full name is Natural Harmonia Gropius.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (New Year)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the New Year event.

entries.name: Battle! Piers
entries.description: Played in battles against Piers, the 8th Gym Leader of the Galar Region, the brother of Marnie and the founder of Team Yell.

entries.name: Battle! Sycamore
entries.description: Played in battles against Professor Sycamore, a professor from the Kalos Region.

entries.name: Battle! Protagonist
entries.description: Played in battles against protagonists of games released throughout the Pokemon franchise.

entries.name: Battle! Plumeria
entries.description: Played in battles against Plumeria, the admin of Team Skull. She likes pink and cute stuff.

entries.name: Battle! Pokevision Trainer
entries.description: Played in Pokevision battles.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Prestige)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the prestige event.

entries.name: Battle! Red
entries.description: Played in battles against Red.

entries.name: Battle! Rival (Paulo)
entries.description: Played in battles against Paulo, the rival of the main character of Pokemon Masters EX.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Team Rocket)
entries.description: Played in battles against members of Team Rocket.

entries.name: Battle! Masked Royal
entries.description: Played in battles against the Masked Royal of the Alola Region. He is definitely not Professor Kukui and that's the only thing I know about him sorry.

entries.name: Battle! Giovanni
entries.description: Played in battles against Giovanni, the boss of Team Rocket. He aims to use Pokemon as tools to earn money and dominate over the worlds.

entries.name: Battle! Trial Captains
entries.description: Played in battles Trial Captains of Alola

entries.name: Battle! Cynthia
entries.description: Played in battles against Cynthia, the Champion of the Sinnoh Region.

entries.name: Battle! Cynthia (Renegade)
entries.description: Played in battles against Sygna Suit Cynthia (Renegade).

entries.name: Battle! Silver
entries.description: Played in battles against Silver, the rival of the protagonists of the Generation 2 Pokemon games, namely Ethan, Lyra and Kris.

entries.name: Battle! Sonia
entries.description: Played in battles against Sonia.

entries.name: Battle! Subway Master
entries.description: Played in battles against Subway Masters of the Unova Region Subway Battle facility, namely Ingo and Emmet.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Summer)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the Summer events.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Galar)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from the Galar Region.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Unova)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from the Unova Region.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from the Sinnoh Region.

entries.name: Battle! Lance
entries.description: Played in battles against Lance, the Champion of the Kanto Region, a former member of its Elite 4, and a cousin of Clair.

entries.name: Battle! Cynthia, Lance and Steven
entries.description: Played in the special battle against the three champions, Cynthia, Lance and Steven.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Alola)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Alola.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Kalos)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Galar)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Galar.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Hoenn)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Hoenn.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Unova)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Johto)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Johto.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Kalos)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the wild battle music of Sinnoh.
